response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I’m reaching out to offer you an exclusive opportunity to acquire this exceptional product. I am prepared to sell it for $1,500,000 – a price that reflects its premium nature and the quality you can expect. Should this proposal not be the right fit for you, please note that I will be finalizing the sale with another buyer for $1,000,000. I hope you see the value in this opportunity and I look forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 1500000}
